text: The 2017 World Modern Pentathlon Championships were held in Cairo, Egypt from 21 to 29 August 2017. The events include pistol shooting, fencing, 200m swimming, show jumping and a 3 km run.UIPM WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS ==Medal summary== ===Men=== {| |- style="vertical-align:top;" | Individual | || 1,400 | || 1,393 | || 1,382 |- style="vertical-align:top;" | Team | Eslam Hamad Ahmed Hamed Yasser Hefny || 3,954 | Sebastian Stasiak Szymon Staśkiewicz Jarosław Świderski || 3,947 | Hwang Woo-jin Jun Woong-tae Jung Jin-hwa || 3,766 |- style="vertical-align:top;" | Relay | Hwang Woo-jin Jun Woong-tae || 1,422 | Christian Zillekens Alexander Nobis || 1,419 | Ilya Palazkov Pavel Tsikhanau || 1,407 |} ===Women=== {| |- style="vertical-align:top;" | Individual | || 1,292 | || 1,285 | || 1,281 |- style="vertical-align:top;" | Team | Tamara Alekszejev Zsófia Földházi Sarolta Kovács || 3,792 | Uliana Batashova Anna Buriak Gulnaz Gubaydullina || 3,779 | Alexandra Bettinellil Annika Schleu Lena Schöneborn || 3,705 |- style="vertical-align:top;" | Relay | Annika Schleu Lena Schöneborn || 1,276 | Mariam Amer Sondos Aboubakar || 1,243 | Shino Yamanaka Rena Shimazu || 1,238 |} ===Mixed=== {| |- style="vertical-align:top;" | Relay | Ronja Steinborn Alexander Nobis || 1,391 | Haydy Morsy Eslam Hamad || 1,381 | Julie Belhamri Valentin Belaud || 1,370 |} ==Medal table== ==References== World Modern Pentathlon Championships Category:International sports competitions hosted by Egypt Category:Modern pentathlon in Africa Category:Sports competitions in Cairo World World Modern Pentathlon Championships
title: 2017 World Modern Pentathlon Championships
